briefTitle: Regimens Comparison for Breast Cancers of Positive Lymph Nodes
officialTitle: Phase 3 Study of Regimens Comparison for Breast Cancers of Positive Lymph Nodes
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* patients with breast cancer after breast cancer surgery with positive lymph nodes age 18-70 years old

Exclusion Criteria:

* with other malignance disease
